mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (userEmailHost, postNo, postTimestamp, commentNo, commentTimestamp, commentNoParent, commentTimestampParent, userEmailGuest, commentContent, commentDepth) VALUES ( #{userEmailHost}, #{postNo}, #{postTimestamp}, #{commentNo}, #{commentTimestamp}, #{commentNoParent}, #{commentTimestampParent}, #{userEmailGuest}, #{commentContent}, #{commentDepth} )
mapper.select: SELECT userEmailHost, postNo, postTimestamp, commentNo, commentTimestamp, commentNoParent, commentTimestampParent, userEmailGuest, commentContent, commentDepth FROM comment WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} ORDER BY postTimestamp DESC, postNo DESC, commentDepth ASC, commentTimestampParent ASC, commentNoParent ASC, commentTimestamp ASC, commentNo ASC
